co.cask.coopr.store.cluster

Class SQLUserClusterStoreView

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.cask.coopr.store.cluster.BaseSQLClusterStoreView
      • co.cask.coopr.store.cluster.SQLUserClusterStoreView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClusterStoreView

    public class SQLUserClusterStoreView
extends BaseSQLClusterStoreView
    The cluster store as viewed by a tenant user. A tenant user can read, write, and delete any cluster they own.
